mapper.insert: insert into ExerciseRecords(exercise_type, intensity, member_id, duration) values(#{exerciseType},#{intensity},#{memberId},#{duration});
mapper.select: select exercise_id from ExerciseRecords where exercise_type = #{exerciseType} and record_date = #{recordDate} and member_id = #{memberId};
select * from ExerciseRecords where member_id = #{memberId} and record_date = #{recordDate};
